## Define a function to write text in typewriter font
tt <- function(x) {
  if (knitr::is_latex_output()) {
    sprintf("\\texttt{%s}", as.character(x))
  } else if (knitr::is_html_output()) {
    sprintf("<tt>%s</tt>", as.character(x))
  } else {
    x
  }
}

library(httr)

## Retrieve Data from `r tt("AoC")`


```{r get-data, cache = FALSE, messages = FALSE}
session_cookie <- set_cookies(session = keyring::key_get("AoC-GitHub-Cookie"))
base_url <- paste0("https://adventofcode.com/", params$year, "/day/", params$task_nr)
puzzle <- GET(base_url,
              session_cookie) %>% 
  content(encoding = "UTF-8") %>% 
  xml_find_all("///article") %>% 
  lapply(as.character)

parse_puzzle_data <- function(text_block = readClipboard()) {
  if (length(text_block) == 1L) {
    text_block <- text_block %>% 
      str_split("\n") %>% 
      extract2(1L) %>% 
      keep(nzchar)
  }
  text_block %>% 
    str_split("") %>% 
    map(~ list(head(.x, length(.x) / 2L), tail(.x, length(.x) / 2L)))
    
}

puzzle_data <- local({
  GET(paste0(base_url, "/input"),
      session_cookie) %>% 
    content(encoding = "UTF-8") %>% 
    parse_puzzle_data()
})
```

# Puzzle Day `r params$task_nr`

## Part 1

### Description

```{r show-puzzle-a, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
cat(puzzle[[1]])
```

### Solution

We loop over each rucksack, find the duplicated entry, assign its points and sum the 
points for the final total.

```{r get-solution-1}
count_points <- function(rucksacks) {
  scores <- 1:52 %>% 
    set_names(c(letters, LETTERS))
  map_int(rucksacks, function(compartments) {
    scores[do.call(intersect, compartments)]
  }) %>% 
    sum()
}

count_points(puzzle_data)
```

## Part 2

### Description

```{r show-puzzle-b, echo = FALSE, results = "asis", eval = length(puzzle) > 1}
cat(puzzle[[2]])
```

We loop over each group of 3 rucksacks, find the common letter as before and score it.

### Solution

```{r get-solution-2}
get_priorities <- function(rucksacks) {
  scores <- 1:52 %>% 
    set_names(c(letters, LETTERS))
  map_int(seq(1L, length(rucksacks), 3L), function(i) {
    items <- map(rucksacks[i:(i+2)], unlist)
    scores[reduce(items, intersect)]
  }) %>% 
    sum()
}

get_priorities(puzzle_data)
```
